recipe.title: Seeded Pumpkin Breakfast Bread Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups ; raw walnuts, halves, toasted and chopped ; (150 g)
2 ¾ cups ; old fashioned rolled oat ; (220 g)

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 350˚F (180˚C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Add the walnuts and pepitas to the prepared baking sheet. Toast in the oven for 10 minutes, until golden brown and fragrant.
In a medium bowl, mix together the toasted walnuts and pepitas, chia seeds, figs, flaxseeds, oats, pumpkin spice, and salt.
In a large bowl, whisk together the pumpkin puree, almond milk, olive oil, and maple syrup.
Then, add the flaxseed meal and dry ingredients and stir with a spatula to incorporate. The “dough” will be moist and somewhat loose.
Transfer the batter to a 9x5-inch (23x13 cm) loaf pan, packing it into the pan. Cover with plastic wrap and let sit at room temperature for 2 hours.
Bake for 1 hour and 20 minutes. The loaf will become very browned during baking. Remove from the oven and let cool for 15-20 minutes before slicing.
Nutrition Calories: 411 Fat: 19 grams Sodium : 373mg Carbs: 31 grams Fiber: 8 grams Sugars: 18 grams Protein: 7 grams

steps_updated.steps_updated: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Add the walnuts and pepitas to the prepared baking sheet.
Toast in the oven for 10 minutes, until golden brown and fragrant.
In a medium bowl, mix together the toasted walnuts and pepitas, chia seeds, figs, flaxseeds, oats, pumpkin spice, and salt.
In a large bowl, whisk together the pumpkin puree, almond milk, olive oil, and maple syrup.
Then, add the flaxseed meal and dry ingredients and stir with a spatula to incorporate.
The “dough” will be moist and somewhat loose.
Transfer the batter to a 9x5-inch (23x13 cm) loaf pan, packing it into the pan.
Cover with plastic wrap and let sit at room temperature for 2 hours.
The loaf will become very browned during baking.
Remove from the oven and let cool for 15-20 minutes before slicing.
Nutrition Calories: 411 Fat: 19 grams Sodium : 373mg Carbs: 31 grams Fiber: 8 grams Sugars: 18 grams Protein: 7 grams
